info.title: paopao-ce API
info.description:
# The paopao-ce API documentation

Welcome to the paopao-ce API documentation!

post.description:
Upload an image to the given bucket.
The `content-type` header must be provided as well
as the `content-length` header otherwise the request will be rejected.

The uploaded file must also not exceed the given `content-length`.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: The bucket that the image should be uploaded.

parameters.name: content-length
parameters.description: The total size of the image in bytes.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
The format that the uploaded image is encoded in.

If not provided, lust will guess the encoding.

400.description:
The image format was incorrect or the system was
unable to guess the format of the image.

413.description: The upload exceeds the configured maximum file size.

401.description:
You are not authorized to complete this action.

This normally means the `Authorization` bearer has been left out
of the request or is invalid.

get.description:
Fetch the image from the storage backend and apply and additional affects
if required.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: The bucket to try fetch the image from.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The encoding format that the image should be returned as.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size preset that should be used when returning the image.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: A custom width to resize the returned image to.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: A custom height to resize the returned image to.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
A set of `,` seperated content-types that could be sent as a response.
E.g. `image/png,image/webp,image/gif`

400.description:
The request is invalid with the current configuration.

See the detail section for more info.

404.description:
Bucket does not exist or image does not exist.

See the detail section for more info.

delete.description:
Delete the given image.
This will purge all variants of the image including sizing presets and formats.

Images that do not exist already will be ignored and will not return a 404.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: The bucket to try delete the image from.

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The image to delete try delete.

401.description:
You are not authorized to complete this action.

This normally means the `Authorization` bearer has been left out
of the request or is invalid.

sizing_id.description:
The computed image sizing id.

This is useful for tracking files outside of lust as this is
generally used for filtering within the storage systems.

image_id.description:
The generated ID for the file.

This can be used to access the file for the given bucket.

processing_time.description: The time spent processing the image in seconds.

io_time.description: The time spent uploading the image to the persistent store.

checksum.description: The crc32 checksum of the uploaded image.

images.description: The information that is specific to the image.

bucket_id.description:
The id of the bucket the image was stored in.

This is useful for tracking files outside of lust as this is
generally used for filtering within the storage systems.
